Package com.islandpower.configurator.controller

Class SolarPanelController

java.lang.Object
com.islandpower.configurator.controller.SolarPanelController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/components/solar-panels") public class SolarPanelController extends Object
Controller for managing solar panel components. Provides endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting solar panels.

    • createSolarPanel

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SolarPanel> createSolarPanel(@RequestBody SolarPanel solarPanel)
      Creates a new solar panel.
      Parameters:
      solarPanel - The solar panel object to be created
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the created SolarPanel with HTTP CREATED status

    • getAllSolarPanels

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<SolarPanel>> getAllSolarPanels()
      Retrieves all solar panels.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a List of SolarPanel objects with HTTP OK status

    • getSolarPanelById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SolarPanel> getSolarPanelById(@PathVariable String id)
      Retrieves a solar panel by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the solar panel to retrieve
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the SolarPanel with HTTP OK status, or NOT_FOUND

    • updateSolarPanel

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SolarPanel> updateSolarPanel(@PathVariable String id, @RequestBody SolarPanel solarPanel)
      Updates an existing solar panel.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the solar panel to update
      solarPanel - The updated solar panel object
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated SolarPanel with HTTP OK status, or NOT_FOUND

    • deleteSolarPanel

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteSolarPanel(@PathVariable String id)
      Deletes a solar panel by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the solar panel to delete
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with HTTP NO_CONTENT status if deletion is successful
